Scripts.OnMouseWheel: scroller=getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."_Scroller") if ( tonumber(arg1) > 0 ) then scroller:SetValue(scroller:GetValue()-1) else scroller:SetValue(scroller:GetValue()+1) end
scroller=getglobal(this:GetParent():GetName().."_Scroller") if ( tonumber(arg1) > 0 ) then scroller:SetValue(scroller:GetValue()-1) else scroller:SetValue(scroller:GetValue()+1) end

Scripts.OnClick: state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("ScrollButtons", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("ActionButtons", state)

Scripts.OnClick: for index, entry in pairs(ForgottenChat_General) do FCCC_PasteProfile(index) end DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cff0000FFForgotten Chat Control Center:|r Pasting profile '"..FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied.profile.."' over all Profiles", 100, 100, 100, 1.0, UIERRORS_HOLD_TIME)

if(FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail.profile==FCCC_GetPlayerIndex())then DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cff0000FFForgotten Chat Control Center:|r You cannot delete your currently active Profile", 100, 100, 100, 1.0, UIERRORS_HOLD_TIME) return end FCCC_DeleteProfile(FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail.profile) DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cff0000FFForgotten Chat Control Center:|r Deleting Profile '"..FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail.profile.."'.", 100, 100, 100, 1.0, UIERRORS_HOLD_TIME) FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail.profile="" FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail:SetText("") FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail.stringName="" FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_CopyButton:Disable() FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_DeleteButton:Disable() FCCC_UpdateProfileList(FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Scroller:GetValue())

if(FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied.profile~="")then FCCC_PasteProfile(FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail.profile) DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cff0000FFForgotten Chat Control Center:|r Pasting profile '"..FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_ProfileCopied.profile.."' over Profile '"..FCCC_Options_Profiles_Panel_Label_Detail.profile.."'.", 100, 100, 100, 1.0, UIERRORS_HOLD_TIME) end
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("LoadMinimized", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("CombatHide", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("CombatMinimize", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("SelectiveWidgets", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("EditOnClick", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("MinimizeUp", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("TimeStamp", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("AudibleAlert", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("IgnoreWhos", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("LockAnchor", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("HideAnchor", state)

Scripts.OnShow: State=FCCC_GetVariable("UseAnchor") if(State=="OFF")then this:SetValue(0) elseif(State=="UP")then this:SetValue(1) elseif(State=="DOWN")then this:SetValue(2) end
Scripts.OnValueChanged: State=this:GetValue() if(State==0)then FCCC_SetVariable("UseAnchor","OFF") FCCC_Options_Behavior_Panel_Label_UseAnchorNum:SetText("OFF") elseif(State==1)then FCCC_SetVariable("UseAnchor","UP") FCCC_Options_Behavior_Panel_Label_UseAnchorNum:SetText("UP") elseif(State==2)then FCCC_SetVariable("UseAnchor","DOWN") FCCC_Options_Behavior_Panel_Label_UseAnchorNum:SetText("DOWN") end FC_AnchorCascade()

Scripts.OnClick: state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("RecordHistory", state)
state=this:GetChecked() if(state==nil)then state=0 end FCCC_SetVariable("EmptyOnLoad", state)

if(this:GetText()=="Delete History")then this:SetText("Click to confirm!") elseif(this:GetText()=="Click to confirm!")then this:SetText("Delete History") ForgottenChat_History[FCCC_GetPlayerIndex()]={} DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cff0000FFForgotten Chat Control Center:|r Whisper history flushed for "..UnitName("player").." of "..GetRealmName(), 100, 100, 100, 1.0, UIERRORS_HOLD_TIME) end
